herbs.name: Aloe Vera
herbs.description: a succulent plant known for its thick, fleshy, green to grey-green leaves, often with white flecks and serrated edges.
herbs.benefits: Soothes burns, promote wound healig, aids digestion

herbs.name: Ginger
herbs.description: a flowering plant, cultivated for its pungent, aromatic rhizome (underground stem) which is used as a spice and sometimes in medicine.

herbs.name: Fennel
herbs.description: An aromatic hern know for its licorice-like flavor and feathery leaves. It has a bulbous base, long green stalks, and produces small, yellow flowers.

herbs.name: Peppermint
herbs.description: A fragrant perennial herb characterized by square stems, lanceolate leaves with serrated edges, and purple flowers.
herbs.benefits: Soothes digestion, relieves headache, and improves focus and memory.

herbs.name: Chamomile
herbs.description: Gentle flower used to calm the gut and mind.
herbs.benefits: Eases digestion, reduces anxiety, supports skin health

herbs.name: Turmeric
herbs.description: Golden root with powerful anti-inflammatory effects.

herbs.name: Mugwort
herbs.description: A wild herb with a long history in dreamwork, rituals, and digestion.
herbs.benefits: Enhances dreams, supports digestion, eases menstrual discomfort
